pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service.utils

Interface ReservationServiceUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReservationServiceUtilsImpl

    public interface ReservationServiceUtils
    Interface used to perform operations for reservation and message service classes.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Reservation createReservation(Book tempBook, User theUser)
      Creates and returns the Reservation with the given User and Book
      void increaseExpirationDate(Reservation reservation)
      Extends the expiration date by 24h.
      Message prepareReservationToDeleteAndCreateNewMessage(Reservation reservation, User adminUser)
      Changes the status of the reservation, then creates and returns the message informing that the reservation has been deleted.

    • Method Detail

      • createReservation

        Reservation createReservation(Book tempBook,
                              User theUser)
        Creates and returns the Reservation with the given User and Book
        Parameters:
        tempBook - The Book containing the book to be reserved
        theUser - The User containing the user who reserved the book
        Returns:
        A Reservation representing the reservation

      • prepareReservationToDeleteAndCreateNewMessage

        Message prepareReservationToDeleteAndCreateNewMessage(Reservation reservation,
                                                      User adminUser)
        Changes the status of the reservation, then creates and returns the message informing that the reservation has been deleted.
        Parameters:
        reservation - The Reservation containing the reservation which status will be changed
        adminUser - The User containing the user who changed the status of the reservation
        Returns:
        A Message representing the message informing that the reservation has been deleted

      • increaseExpirationDate

        void increaseExpirationDate(Reservation reservation)
        Extends the expiration date by 24h.
        Parameters:
        reservation - The Reservation containing the reservation which expiration date will be extended
